DESCRIPTION:
Rumisabar is a service developed under the motto "highly flexible and convenient"!
You can set any background image you like for all of our services, and if it's not too much of a bottom line, it's acceptable.
(It's like Google.)
Please create an account and use it! (Once you create an account, you can use it for all services.)
Also, there are some non-services mixed in, but don't worry about it (see below).
